document_data.caption: A map showing Ussilbran Street and surroundings in the North Ward of Waterdeep.
document_data.name: Ussilbran Street
document_data.mainbody: '''Ussilbran Street''' was a road that was located in the city of [[Waterdeep]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Waterdeep}}
document_data.Location: Ussilbran Street was located in the southern section of Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/North Ward|North Ward]]. The road ran north to south, originating in the north at the intersection of [[Saerdoun Street]] and [[Lion Street]], and passing south to end on [[Tarsar's Street]]. Ussilbran Street was intersected by [[Sulmor Street]], [[Endcliff Lane]], and [[Hassantyr's Street]]
